Description: Student is unable to count in a foreign language (ex. English)
Student can count with teacher prompting, and can recall some basic words with one prompt
Student can count without prompts and recall some words
Student can recite positions in the warm up, at least six of the diagonal steps' names and positions
Student can recite positions in the warm up, diagonal steps, and muscle names
Student can recite simple phrases (minimum of 3 words)
Student can make himself understood to ask questions or make comments
